CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 18, 1969, pg. 15 reads: "Three Pretty Young mothers and some of the tots that took part in the recent Baby Popularity Contest sponsored by the Allegheny Union Baptist Association at Ebenezer Baptist Church. The winning baby was l'tle David Bentley, who rests in the lap of his mother, Mrs. Irene Bentley, right.  Second prize was won by little Tonya McPherson, held in the arms of her mother, Mrs. Percilla McPherson, left.  Posing with the winners are Mrs. Marva McPherson and baby Nicole; Elaine, Venerable and Shari Cook of Jeanette.  The McPhersons are from McKeesport. - Harris photo.
TitMainTitle: Tonya McPherson held by Percilla McPherson, Marva McPherson and baby Nicole, and David Bentley, seated on lap of Irene Bentley, with Elaine Venerable and Shari Cook in foreground, in Ebenezer Baptist Church for baby contest
